content:
That sounds like a great idea! Trying out a new tea subscription service can be a wonderful way to discover new tea varieties and support small farmers around the world. It's also a lovely way to treat yourself on your birthday.

I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to try out the Pomodoro Technique. Remember, it's all about finding a rhythm that works for you and making adjustments as needed. Don't be too hard on yourself if you don't get it perfect at first – it's a process, and it's okay to adapt it to your needs.

Regarding the tea subscription service, it's fantastic that you're considering supporting small farmers. Sourcing teas from small farms can make a significant difference in the lives of the farmers and their communities. Plus, you'll get to enjoy a variety of unique and high-quality teas delivered right to your doorstep!

When you do try out the subscription service, I'd love to hear about your experience. Which teas do you think you'll enjoy the most? Are you looking forward to trying any specific types of tea or flavor profiles?
